Plasma Prime is the thing to be watching now.

The research sounds complex, but the result is that it reduces client-side load by 3-6 orders of magnitude.

PoCs coming soon I believe!

The most private cryptocurrency is one that doesn't let you transact. Zero information is leaked, scales to millions of trillions of users, 0 byte blocks means block propagation occurs faster than the speed of light.
